definition: hit the mark, hit upon, do (something) right, succeed in, guess right
be accustomed,be in the habit of
go forward,go ahead,move ahead,take the lead

related_verbs: decir except for most of decir's manual overrides

definition: play (a part),act (a part),discharge,perform (a duty),take out of pawn(shop)
stretch oneself,stretch one's arms and legs

notes: alternative 'yergu' ( i.e. y in front ) only in present

related_verbs: decir except for most of decir's manual overrides -- also maldito when used as an adjective with estar

definition: look at oneself,look at each other
